tab.title: See how NutriSwish  is changing lives

review_list.review_text: Nutriswish has been a game-changer for me! I've been using it for a few months now, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my energy levels and overall vitality. It's amazing how something so simple can have such profound effects. Highly recommend!

I've struggled with maintaining hormone balance for years, but Nutriswish has made a world of difference. Not only do I feel more balanced and energized, but I've also noticed improvements in my skin tone and muscle tone. It's truly remarkable!

product_benefits.title: Benefits of using NutriSwish
product_benefits.desc: To maintain optimal levels, frequent and costly IV treatments are required, which can be impractical for many individuals.In contrast, NutriSwish utilizes nano glutathione, which offers several distinct advantages over IV treatments.

items_left.title: Enhanced Bioavailability
items_left.desc: Nano-sized glutathione particles mean a greater proportion of glutathione is utilized, maximizing its antioxidant benefits.

items_left.title: Sustained Release
items_left.desc: Oral administration allows for a more consistent and sustained release of glutathione into the bloodstream.

items_right.title: Cost-Effectiveness
items_right.desc: A more affordable alternative to regular IV glutathione treatments. Eliminate the need for frequent clinic visits, reducing overall costs.

items_right.title: Convenience
items_right.desc: Unparalleled convenience compared to the more invasive and time-consuming IV treatments.

product_post_list.title: Innovative science
product_post_list.desc: Glutathione is the protector and detoxifier of the cell.It’s the key to the life, health, performance, protection and longevity of every human cell.

product_post_list.title: HydraStat™ nanotechnology
product_post_list.desc: Nano-sized particles protected by ultra-pure water clusters.Our nanosized ingredients are small enough to be fully absorbed into the human cell.

product_post_list.title: Quality over quantity
product_post_list.desc: A supplement is only as good as its bioavailability, which is its ability to be absorbed and used by the body.The correct delivery system delivers ingredients to your body in a way that your body can absorb and use.

key_ingredients.title: NutriSwish key ingredients
key_ingredients.ingredients: Active Ingredients:ULTRA-PURE WATER, GLUTATHIONE, L-CYSTEINE, CALCIUM ASCORBATE, CURCUMIN, TARTARIC ACID, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PEPPERMINT EXTRACT. *IMAGE SHOWS A PLANT/FOOD IN WHICH THE ACTIVE INGREDIENT IS FOUND AND NOT NECESSARILY WHERE IT IS EXTRACTED FROM.

steps.caption: Measure two (2) teaspoons of product. One capful = teaspoon.
Swish in your mouth for 30 seconds or more.
Unlike mouthwash, you can swallow NutriSwish. You can also spit it out, if you prefer.
Repeat these steps twice a day. Feel free to use NutriSwish more often, if desired.

items.desc: Glutathione is able to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their harmful effects.It also helps to reduce inflammation, and supports the body's natural ability to fight off infection.In addition, it plays a role in the synthesis of new immune cells, keeping your immune system functioning at its best.

cta.title: A new you starts with Neumi
cta.note_desc: The statements made within this website have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.These statements and the products of this company are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
